about_the_game:
Have you ever wanted to help a hapless save his factory from closing by forcing him to complete a slideshow presentation? No? Really? You'd never thought about it before now? Huh. In this Dialtown DLC, the player is tasked with helping Roger Jones finish a slideshow presentation, but naturally, pure unadulterated malarkey ensues.

  • Roger has a lot to say, with over a THOUSAND voiced dialogue lines ranging from confessions of his innermost turmoil to lashing out at you over centipede-related aggression! Really get to know Roger via a multitude of voice acted scenes where Roger talks about his life, responsibilities, worries and hopes for the future!

  • The route has 8 endings, ranging from guzzling cough syrup in a circus tent to getting thrown in jail for fraud! The possibilities are endless! (And by endless, I mean there's exactly eight of them.)

  • Run a scam on Roger and trick him into delivering a pyramid scheme crypto rug-pull to his workers (you can destroy the dude's life and WORSE!)

  • A new Original Soundtrack by Nathan Hanover, featuring 14 tracks not heard in Dialtown's basegame, from remixes/reprises of existing tracks to completely NEW tracks!

  • Choices that matter! The choices you make will impact the lives of the citizens of Dialtown! Be responsible! (Or don't. I can't really do anything either way. Like, c'mon. I WISH I was that powerful...)

  • Control the pace of conversations with skip points all over the DLC. With a script of over 94,000 words, you can spend HOURS talking to Rogers about baboons, centipedes, pyramid schemes and more!

  • Spend time with most (if not all) of your favourite Dialtown characters! This route has a shocking amount of character cameos! Ticket Jerry, Randy, Oliver + Karen Dunn fans rejoice!

With over 6 hours of potential playtime, over 1500 lines of voice acting, 8 endings, new art, new music and so much more, this DLC is a STEAL for the price I'm selling it at! So, what are you waiting for? Purchase it TODAY!!!
detailed_description:
Have you ever wanted to help a hapless save his factory from closing by forcing him to complete a slideshow presentation? No? Really? You'd never thought about it before now? Huh. In this Dialtown DLC, the player is tasked with helping Roger Jones finish a slideshow presentation, but naturally, pure unadulterated malarkey ensues.

  • Roger has a lot to say, with over a THOUSAND voiced dialogue lines ranging from confessions of his innermost turmoil to lashing out at you over centipede-related aggression! Really get to know Roger via a multitude of voice acted scenes where Roger talks about his life, responsibilities, worries and hopes for the future!

  • The route has 8 endings, ranging from guzzling cough syrup in a circus tent to getting thrown in jail for fraud! The possibilities are endless! (And by endless, I mean there's exactly eight of them.)

  • Run a scam on Roger and trick him into delivering a pyramid scheme crypto rug-pull to his workers (you can destroy the dude's life and WORSE!)

  • A new Original Soundtrack by Nathan Hanover, featuring 14 tracks not heard in Dialtown's basegame, from remixes/reprises of existing tracks to completely NEW tracks!

  • Choices that matter! The choices you make will impact the lives of the citizens of Dialtown! Be responsible! (Or don't. I can't really do anything either way. Like, c'mon. I WISH I was that powerful...)

  • Control the pace of conversations with skip points all over the DLC. With a script of over 94,000 words, you can spend HOURS talking to Rogers about baboons, centipedes, pyramid schemes and more!

  • Spend time with most (if not all) of your favourite Dialtown characters! This route has a shocking amount of character cameos! Ticket Jerry, Randy, Oliver + Karen Dunn fans rejoice!

With over 6 hours of potential playtime, over 1500 lines of voice acting, 8 endings, new art, new music and so much more, this DLC is a STEAL for the price I'm selling it at! So, what are you waiting for? Purchase it TODAY!!!
legal_notice: Dialtown: Phone Dating Sim is the intellectual property of DirectDogman and each license is non-transferable between Steam accounts. All assets included have been created for Dialtown, licensed, or came from free to use resources (with proper attribution where necessary in the credits.) Dialtown: Phone Dating Sim's soundtrack was composed by Nathan Hanover, who owns the tracks outright. The IP holders of Dialtown's custom assets and the editors of Dialtown's assets derived from free to use sources are licensed to the end user only within the context of being used by the steam Dialtown: Phone Dating Sim executable file, and are not licensed to the end user for redistribution/creative use outside of playing the game. All Rights Reserved. Regards,
name: Dialtown: Roger's Route DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
